name: Fruity Shooty
description: This is the first game I've made, and am publishing it here because it seems easiest to do so. It's not perfect, but I'm happy with what came out. It follows the general tutorials set out by GML when making Space Rocks, but I wanted to make it just a tad different with my own little twist. I already have plans for a sequel to it if people actually like the concept. Any advice or tips on how to improve are greatly appreciated. Also, if you do end up playing it, then thank you very much, and I hope you enjoy!
